snippet: British employers expect wage growth to remain weak, according to a survey of personnel managers on Monday that contrasted with other reports that salaries are set to rise at a faster pace....

headline.print_headline: UK Employers Expect Scant Upturn in Wages-Survey
headline.main: UK Employers Expect Scant Upturn in Wages-Survey

lead_paragraph: British employers expect wage growth to remain weak, according to a survey of personnel managers on Monday that contrasted with other reports that salaries are set to rise at a faster pace.
